alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:47AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Feliciana, northern West Baton Rouge, Pointe Coupee, central East Feliciana, northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southeastern Wilkinson Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 646 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Krotz Springs, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zachary, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Livonia, Woodville, Slaughter, Fordoche, Morganza, Wilson, Norwood, Wakefield, Spillman, Batchelor and Lottie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
